items.name: changeMode(mode, isWithoutFocus)
items.description: Change editor's mode to given mode string

params.name: mode
params.description: Editor mode name of want to change

items.name: getCurrentPreviewStyle()
items.description: Get current Markdown editor's preview style

items.name: getTextObject(range)
items.description: Get text object of current range

items.name: isMarkdownMode()
items.description: Return true if current editor mode is Markdown

items.name: isViewer
items.description: Check whether is viewer (using in plugins)

items.name: isWysiwygMode()
items.description: Return true if current editor mode is WYSIWYG

properties.name: height
properties.description: Editor's height style value. Height is applied as border-box ex) '300px', '100%', 'auto'

properties.name: minHeight
properties.description: Editor's min-height style value in pixel ex) '300px'

properties.name: load
properties.description: It would be emitted when editor fully load

properties.name: change
properties.description: It would be emitted when content changed

properties.name: stateChange
properties.description: It would be emitted when format change by cursor position

properties.name: focus
properties.description: It would be emitted when editor get focus

properties.name: blur
properties.description: It would be emitted when editor loose focus

properties.name: previewBeforeHook
properties.description: Submit preview to hook URL before preview be shown

properties.name: useCommandShortcut
properties.description: whether use keyboard shortcuts to perform commands

properties.name: plugins
properties.description: Array of plugins. A plugin can be either a function or an array in the form of function, options.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: The placeholder text of the editable element.

properties.name: linkAttribute
properties.description: Attributes of anchor element that shold be rel, target, contenteditable, hreflang, type

items.name: setPlaceholder(placeholder)
items.description: Set the placeholder on all editors

items.name: setUI(UI)
items.description: Set UI to private UI property
